name: GiereJump (BETA 1.3)
description:
How to do I play?:

Left Arrow - Left
Right Arrow - Right
SPACE/SHIFT - Jump
E/F - Interaction

What is GiereJump?:

Arcade 2D platform game. You will not encounter checkpoints in this game,
but you will find puzzles,
trapdoors and many more more difficult.
We try to update the game frequently and add a lot of new things.
We wish you good luck and have fun.

Languages:

- Polish
- English
